title: Import Error: DLL load failed: The specific procedure could not be found.

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
Hi everyone! 

**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**
I work on Windows 10, Anaconda3, 2019.10 and use the "easy install" option for GPU.

**Describe the problem**
I have been struggling for a few days now when trying to import Deeplabcut. I always get the same error (DLL load failed: The specified procedure could not be found.). I am following the easy install procedure with "conda env create -f DLC-GPU.yaml". I attached the code.

I have downgraded the Cuda Toolkit Version from 11 to 9. However, when checking the NVIDIA system management interface, it says that I am still using CUDA Version 11. But when checking nvcc --version, it looks like version 9 is installed (see screenshot).
![Screenshot1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67375306/85580311-e6d0f100-b63b-11ea-9544-70d904e4b3e3.JPG)
 

I am using tensorflow version 1.14.0 and Python 3.7.7. 

I already went through similar problems previously reported.. Unfortunately, none could help me to fix my issue. Thanks you for your help.

```
